item.title: Visualizing Clusters with Iris
item.description: class: inverse # The Dataset I chose the cran built-in iris dataset. Iris Dataset This dataset is a very nice dataset for clustering. Sorry for choosing an easy dataset! I had meant to work through the visualization first and repeat this with a more interesting example. class: inverse # The Objective The goal is to explore the data using clustering methods. To do this, we will employ and visualize a Gaussian Mixture Model, we will also employ Principal Component Analysis to (hopefully) give the best view of the clusters.
